entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:37 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 9.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 4:55 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 9.0°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 8.3°C
Wind: SSW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. High 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
